summary: Defines a hierarchy of foundational Pydantic models used throughout the Prefect server for schema objects. Includes utilities for automatic UUID generation, creation/update timestamp handling, iteration over action objects, copying with field resets, and flexible JSON serialization while managing unknown fields based on environment mode.
business_intent: Provide a consistent, reusable base for all Prefect server data models that ensures unique identifiers, proper timestamp tracking, forwardâ€‘compatible field handling, and reliable serialization/copying behavior across ORM entities and API schemas.
